articles.description: The Mumbai-based music composer Yashraj Mukhate joined the #PawriHoRahiHai meme trend, giving hilarious musical twist to viral video that originated in Pakistan.
articles.content: The pandemic may have killed weekend party vibes but netizens are more than making up for it with #PawriHoRahiHai, thanks to a new peppy anthem by Yashraj Mukhate. What began as the viral meme trend … [+3550 chars]

articles.title: Miss India runner-up Manya Singh goes on a victory rally in her father’s autorickshaw - The Hindu
articles.description: Born in Mumbai and raised in the small town of Hata in Uttar Pradesh, Manya was crowned VLCC Femina Miss India 2020 runner-up in a ceremony last week.
articles.content: The beauty queen rode an autorickshaw to her alma mater on Tuesday, her father in the drivers seat and her mother holding her hand sitting at the back, a family that dared to dream big and gave it th… [+4059 chars]

articles.description: Bollywood stars aren't letting this Pakistani trend die out.
articles.content:
The "pawri" is still raging on social media and celebrities from across the border are joining in.

articles.title: Karisma And Ibrahim Check In On Mom-To-Be Kareena Kapoor NDTV - NDTV
articles.description: On Wednesday, Karisma Kapoor dropped by to visit sister Kareena Kapoor at her Bandra residence, who is in her final days of pregnancy.

articles.title: Sara Ali Khan rocks in red with her girl gang, is this from her Galentine's Day party? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sara Ali Khan shared a cute picture with her girl gang. All were dressed in red and holding red roses. Her fans were more than happy to see their favourite star. See here.
articles.content:
Actor Sara Ali Khan has shared a new picture where she is seen posing with her girl gang. All the girls are seen in red with a red rose in their hands

articles.author: Pinkvilla Desk
articles.title: Priyanka Chopra calls her journey 'one hell of a ride': I came out thriving, want lil girls to think about it - PINKVILLA
articles.description: In a recent chat with a national daily, actor-producer-singer-author, Priyanka Chopra Jonas opened up about her life and journey. The star even revealed if her mom Madhu Chopra and husband Nick Jonas have read her memoir 'Unfinished.'

articles.author: Pinkvilla Desk
articles.title: 'Kangana Ranaut you are a nuclear bomb', Ram Gopal Varma praises her in now deleted tweet about Dhaakad star - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Kangana Ranaut recently shared a selfie from the action shoot of Dhaakad with traces of blood on her face. Filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma took to Twitter to laud the actress for her professionalism. However, he deleted the tweet later.

articles.author: Pinkvilla Desk
articles.title: R Madhavan receives degree of Doctor of Letters for contribution to Arts and Cinema: ‘I am truly humbled’ - PINKVILLA
articles.description: R Madhavan receives honour for his contribution to arts in cinema. The actor expressed his gratitude upon receiving the degree.

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Roohi trailer: Janhvi Kapoor turns bride-stealer ghost for Rajkummar Rao in follow up to Stree - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rajkummar Rao and Janhvi Kapoor-starrer Roohi is the second installment in the Stree franchise. It revolves around a singing ghost who puts grooms to sleep so it can possess their brides.
articles.content: The makers of Stree are back with the second installment in the horror-comedy franchise, Roohi. The trailer looks as impressive as the original as it teases the story of a ghost who possesses brides … [+2008 chars]
